#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
long long max(long long a,long long b)
{
	if(a>b)return a;
	return b;
}
int main()
{
int n;scanf("%d",&n);
string s;
bool b[n];
int l[n];
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
	cin>>s;
	if(s=="found")b[i]=0;
	else b[i]=1;
	scanf("%d",&l[i]);
}
long dp[n+1];
dp[0]=0;dp[1]=0;
for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
{
	long x=0;
	if(!b[i]){dp[i]=dp[i-1];continue;}
	for(int j=i-1;j>=1;j--)
	{
		if(b[j])continue;
		if(l[j]==l[i]){x=l[i]+dp[j-1];break;}
	}
	dp[i]=max(dp[i-1],x);
}
printf("%ld",dp[n]);
}
